data.message: Kendrick and em probably working on a Mo3 diss. Calling himself the rap good and taking shots and Kendrick. Well they best come with some heat cus don't doubt the god! #FreeMontana

Well obviously you haven't listened to Montana, ain't saying he'd win, but i definitely don't count him out. Montana is one of the most lyrical artist ever, actually sit down and listen to him. Montana is a force to be rekoned with, and em has dropped off a lot as he's aged, unless slim shady actually comes back, and back to his prime (if my original comment is what's going on) Kendrick would be eminems saving factor. Look at Montana's recent music and eminems recent music, listen to the lyrics, and tell me who's better right now. Cus if yo actually do, you'll see rn, Montana is the best rapper out.
